channel.title: -Ski & Snowboard Travel Show- (video) powdertravel.com
channel.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
channel.description: Skiing & Snowboarding Travel Show featuring reviews of the top Ski & Snowboard resorts from around the World. Plus bonus competition footage including the Quiksilver Slopestyle Pro and the Freestyle Skiing World Cup. With more than 40 episodes filmed we take you to all the best powder, terrain, halfpipes and parks on offer accross the USA, Europe, Japan and more to come. produced by powdertravel.com Visit www.powdertravel.com for hundreds of reviews, videos and ski and snowboard news.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ski & Snowboard Travel Show - powdertravel.com
channel.itunes:summary: Skiing & Snowboarding Travel Show featuring reviews of skiing & Snowboard resorts from around the World. With 20 episodes filmed we take you to all the best powder, terrain, halfpipes and parks on offer accross the USA, Europe, Japan and more to come. produced by powdertravel.com

item.itunes:summary: Flims Laax is well known amongst the worlds best freestyle skiers and snowboarders due its strong history of building great freestyle terrain parks and half pipes. However the area is also a vast domain of wide open terrain for those who are not drawn by the freestyle scence

item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Les Arc Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Thirty Six
item.itunes:summary: Les Arc is the home of some of the Steepest inbounds ski and snowboard terrain in the world. Also home to the Flying Killometer where skiers and snowboards strap on the speed suits and point themselves straight down in an attempt to break world speed records

item.title: Valdisere Terrain Park Movie - episode Thirty Five Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Valdisere France Terrain Park Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Thirty Five
item.itunes:summary: Val d'Isere France Terrain Park - For those who like to test themselves the monster hits at this terrain Park are something special. Beautifully crafted with perfect landing zones ensures smooth and giant tricks can be styled from kickers ranging from gentle beginner to extremely huge.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Copper Mountain Colorado Movie - episode Thirty Four Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Copper Mountain Colorado Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Thirty Four
item.itunes:summary: Copper Mountain Colorado Movie / A great family resort both on and off the mountain. With naturally divided terrain which separates beginners, intermeadiates and avanced into their own areas. Add to this great back bowls and strong freestyle scene makeing it one of Colorados must visit ski & snowboard resorts
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Vail Colorado Movie - episode Thirty Three Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Vail Colorado Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Thirty Three
item.itunes:summary: Vail Colorado Movie / Colorado's and posibly North Americas most famost resort, Vail lives up to its hype with a great snow record, fantastic town, great freestyle facilities, huge back bowls and a front side that would be the envy of most resort worldwide.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Hakuba 47 & Goryu Toomi Movie - episode Thirty Two Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Hakuba 47 & Goryu Toomi Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Thirty Two
item.itunes:summary: Hakuba 47 & Goryu Toomi Movie / These lift linked Japanese resorts are located in the Hakuba Valley in the Nagano region. Home to the areas steepest mogul terrain and best halfpipe and terrain park, Hakuba 47 & Goryu Toomi are the most popular resorts in the valley for freestlyers.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Steamboat Terrain Park - episode Thirty One Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Steamboat Colorado Terrain Park / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Thirty One
item.itunes:summary: Steamboat Terrain Park / With a proud history of freestyle excellence, Steamboart resort prepares one of the USA's top terrain parks. Mavericks has long been amongst the top halfpipes on the planet and for good reason, draws some of the worlds top skiers and snowboarders on a regular basis
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Steamboat Resort Movie - episode Thirty Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Steamboat Colorado Resort Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Thirty
item.itunes:summary: Steamboat Resort Movie / Steamboat is a magnificent ski and snowboard resort with a reputation for great powder snow and some of the best tree sections on the planet. With its strong history as a cowboy town combined with a world class resort, Steamboat is one of Colorado's and the World's must visit destinations
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Alpine Meadows Lake Tahoe Resort Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twenty Nine
item.itunes:summary: Alpine Meadows Resort Movie / Lake Tahoes most relaxed and friendly resort also has some of the areas most exciting terrain for advanced skiers and snowboarders. Wide open powder bowls, cliff drops, chutes, cornices, fast pistes and a well maintained terrain park
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Davos Switzerland Terrain Park Video / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twenty Eight
item.itunes:summary: Davos Switzerland Terrain Park / The Halfpipes at Jackobshorn and Bolgen in Davos are home to big international competitions throughout the year. Come and see the locals in action in on of Europes most beautiful Ski and Snowboard destinations.

item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Les Arcs France Review Video / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twenty Seven
item.itunes:summary: Les Arcs France Resort Review / One of Europes biggest ski and snowboard resorts, Les Arcs France offers up some of the most extreme inbounds terrain on the Planet, Plus plenty of variety for all levels of skiing and snowboarding.

item.title: Hakuba 47 Terrain Park - episode Twenty Six Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Hakuba 47 Terrain Park Video / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twenty Six
item.itunes:summary: Hakuba 47 Terrain Park / This week we take a look at one of Japans top ski and snowboard terrain parks. Located in the mid section at the top of the gondola it is the Hakuba Valleys hot spot for freestyle riding with plenty of gaps, rails, kickers a halfpipe, boarder cross and designated mogul course

item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Kitzbuhel Austria Movie ski & snowboard movie
item.itunes:subtitle: Kitzbuhel Austria Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twenty Five
item.itunes:summary: Kitzbuhel Austria Movie / We head back to Kitzbuhel to checkout more of the town, terrain and plenty of off piste powder skiing and snowboarding action in some of kitzbuhels wide open powder bowls.

item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Squaw Valley USA ski & snowboard movie
item.itunes:subtitle: Squaw Valley USA Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twenty Four
item.itunes:summary: Squaw Valley California Movie / We revist Squaw Valley Lake Tahoe and check out more of the resorts vast and impressive terrain and then head over to the terrain park for a big freestyle session with the locals.

item.title: Chamonix France Movie - episode Twenty Three Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Chamonix France Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twenty Three
item.itunes:summary: Chamonix France Movie / We revist the mountain sports capital of the World, Chamonix is a must visit for any serious mountain lover. Giant Mountains, extreme terrain and an amazing town below. Here you will find terrain unlike any other in the World, The Aiguille Du Midi, Valle Blanche and Argentiere are just some of the highlights of this Stunning resort.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Jackson Hole Movie - episode Twenty Two Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Jackson Hole Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twenty Two
item.itunes:summary: Jackson Hole Movie / check out all the action from Wyomings most famous ski and snowboard resort. Jackson Hole with its Aerial Tram is home to the longest continuous vertical rise in the USA opening up vast terrain full of cliff drops, technical steeps and plenty of fresh powder snow
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Vail Colorado Resort Review - episode Twenty One Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Vail Colorado Resort Review ski & snowboard review of Vail Colorado
item.itunes:subtitle: Vail Colorado Resort Review / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twenty One
item.itunes:summary: Vail Colorado Resort Review / Vail is often voted the number one ski and snowboard resort in the USA. Vail has a huge amount of terrain for all abilities, from the legendary back bowls, covering more than 6 miles across, to the front side’s long cruisers and steep bumps. Plus one of the best half pipe and terrain parks anywhere.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Flims Laax Terrain Park - episode Twenty Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Flims Laax Switzerland Terrain Park ski & snowboard action in one of Europes best terrain parks and home to the Burton European snowboard open
item.itunes:subtitle: Flims Laax Terrain Park / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode twenty
item.itunes:summary: Flims Laax Terrain Park / The Flims Laax area is one of Europes best kept secrets and the freestyle ski and snowboard scene is huge here with one of the best terrain parks in Switzerland and all of Europe.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Val d'Isere France Movie - episode Nineteen Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Val d'Isere France Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Nineteen
item.itunes:summary: Val d'Isere France Movie / Val d'Isere offers extensive terrain, suitable for all levels. Experts can stay on the steeper pistes, such as the Olympic Downhill run, "The Face", or venture off piste into powder fields and challenging chutes. Intermediates will love the groomed trails winding through open fields enabling you to just 'pop off' the trails into the powder
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Aspen Snowmass Resort Review - episode Eighteen Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Aspen Snowmass Resort Review ski & snowboard review of Aspen Snowmass
item.itunes:subtitle: Aspen Snowmass Resort Review / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Eighteen
item.itunes:summary: Aspen Snowmass Resort Review / The Aspen Snowmass Valley spreads accross 12 miles and holds the four resorts of Aspen Mountain, Aspen Highlands, Buttermilk and Snowmass. Aspen Mountain has great steep bumps leading to long cruisers.Snowmass boasts Long wide open cruising runs great on powder days, extensive terrain parks. Buttermilk with mainly intermediate cruising terrain, has the draw card of the 2 mile long terrain park, one of the world’s best and home to the ESPN Winter X games. Aspen Highlands has challenging steeps, complimented with cruising runs for all abilities with the steep Highland Bowl the highlight.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Aspen Snowmass Terrain Park - episode Seventeen Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Aspen Snowmass Terrain Park ski & snowboard action from some of the best terrain parks on the planet
item.itunes:subtitle: Aspen Snowmass Terrain Park / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Seventeen
item.itunes:summary: Aspen Snowmass Terrain Park / The Aspen Snowmass area is home to some of the worlds best terrain parks and half pipes. Buttermilk is home to the winter x games and possibly the best terain park on the planet. Catch the action from all the parks as local riders go big.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Davos Switzerland Movie - episode Sixteen Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Davos Switzerland Movie ski & snowboard action from the beautiful Swiss resort of Davos by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Davos Switzerland Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Sixteen
item.itunes:summary: Davos offers fantastic skiing and snowboarding, wide open cruising trails, steep drops, powder fields & is party resort well know for its vast sundecks on the upper Jackobshorn slopes providing revellers with hot tubs, themed bars complete with faux palm trees sun beds and parasailing.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski

item.title: Happo One Japan Movie - episode Fifteen Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Happo One Japan Movie ski & snowboard action from the Hakuba Valley by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Happo One Japan Movie / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Fifteen
item.itunes:summary: Happo One is the number one resort in Nagano's Hakuba Valley. Deep powder, uncrowded slopes and long runs are some of the features of this exciting ski and snowboard destination.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Freestyle World Cup Skiing action from Steamboat Colorado USA by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Freestyle Skiing World Cup / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Fourteen
item.itunes:summary: Freestyle World Cup Skiing action from Steamboat Colorado USA. Watch the pros go fast and big in the Mogul and Aerials competitions as they fight it out for World Cup points. Insane speed and massive air.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.title: Quiksilver Slopestyle Pro Free ride session - Les Arcs France - episode Thirteen Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Quiksilver Slopestyle Pro Free ride session - Les Arcs France by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Quiksilver Slopestyle Pro Free ride session / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Thirteen
item.itunes:summary: Quiksilver Slopestyle Pro is one of the most impressive competitions on the planet with huge hits, rails and a perfect pipe each year attracting the worlds best. Journey to Les Arcs France for a look at some amazing snowboarding and skiing in the free ride session
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.title: Zermatt Switzerland Resort Review Resort Review - episode Twelve Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Zermatt Switzerland Resort Review - Skiing & Snowboarding review of Zermatt Switzerland by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Zermatt Switzerland Resort Review / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode Twelve
item.itunes:summary: World famous for the towering Matterhorn at 14,691 feet, visable from all angles, Zermatt is a vacation to remember. From the rustic beautiful pedestrian village to the awesome views and challenging pistes.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.title: Copper Mountain USA Resort Review - episode eleven Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Copper Mountain USA Resort Review - Skiing & Snowboarding review of Copper Mountain USA by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Copper Mountain USA Resort Review / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode eleven
item.itunes:summary: Copper Mountain USA Ski & Snowboard resort review /Copper Mountain is naturally divided to suit all ski and snowboard abilities. The areas of Union Peak and Tucker Mountain give access to the spectacular double black back bowls. Advanced visitors will enjoy the runs through Union Bowl and Upper Enchanted Forest. Freestylers are not forgotten with some of the best halfpipe and terrain park facilities in the USA
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.title: Mt Rose USA Resort Review - episode ten Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Mt Rose Nevada USA Resort Review - Skiing & Snowboarding review of Mt Rose USA by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Mt Rose USA Resort Review / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode ten
item.itunes:summary: Mt Rose USA Ski & Snowboard resort review / Averaging over 400 inches of snow per season Mt Rose is the closest Lake Tahoe ski and snowboard resort to the gaming city Reno Nevada with 60 plus trails providing great terrain for all levels.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.title: Val d'Isere France Resort Review - episode nine Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Val d'Isere France Resort Review - Skiing & Snowboarding review of Val d'Isere France by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Val d'Isere France Resort Review / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode nine
item.itunes:summary: Val d'Isere France Ski & Snowboard resort review / Val d'Isere France is affectionately referred to as the 'Kingdom of Skiing and Snowboarding'. The resort is one half of the ski area 'Espace Killy' sharing its lift space with neighboring Tignes and covering 300km of terrain. The extensive Val d'Isere terrain is highlighted by endless open powder fields, steep chutes, moguls, fast pistes plus an impressive terrain park.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.title: Steamboat USA Resort Review - episode eight Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Steamboat USA Resort Review - Skiing & Snowboarding review of Steamboat USA by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Steamboat USA Resort Review / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode eight
item.itunes:summary: Steamboat Ski & Snowboard resort review / Steamboat boasts some of the best ski & snowboard terrain in Colorado. Steamboat offers long trials, steeps, bumps and is most famous for some of the world’s best champagne powder snow. When the powder is falling Steamboat is a ski & snowboard paradise, with tree sections amongst the best in the world.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.title: Kitzbuhel Austria Resort Review - episode seven Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Kitzbuhel Austria Resort Review - Skiing & Snowboarding review of Kitzbuhel Austria by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Kitzbuhel Austria Resort Review / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode seven
item.itunes:summary: Kitzbuhel Ski & Snowboard resort review / Kitzbuhel is a fantastic ski and snowboard resort supported by a beautiful town of traditional Austrian buildings lining cobblestone streets. Famous for the annual Hahnenkamm downhill ski race, this diverse resort has plenty to offer. Many of the surrounding peaks give access to virtually 360 degree ski and snowboard terrain consisting of huge powder fields, leading into exciting tree lined groomers.
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.title: Alpine Meadows Resort Review - episode Six Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Alpine Meadows Resort Review - Skiing & Snowboarding review of Alpine Meadows Lake Tahoe USA by powdertravel.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Alpine Meadows Resort Review / Ski & Snowboard Travel Show episode six
item.itunes:summary: Alpine Meadows Ski & Snowboard resort review / Located in the Tahoe National Forest with stunning views of Lake Tahoe, Alpine Meadows is naturally divided into advanced, intermediate and beginner terrain. The advanced Sherwood Bowl area offers the feeling of out of bounds skiing and boarding whilst still being within the resort boundary and is some of the best open powder terrain in the whole Lake Tahoe region. / For more resort videos and reviews subscribe to this podcast or go to powdertravel.com
item.itunes:keywords: skiing, snowboarding, Travel, ski, snowboard, halfpipe, extreeme, snow, powder, powdertravel, powder travel, powdertravel.com, freeski,

item.title: Chamonix France Resort Review - episode Five Ski & Snowboard Travel Show Powdertravel.com
item.itunes:author: powdertravel.com
item.description: Chamonix France Resort Review - Skiing & Snowboarding review of Chamonix France by powdertravel.com

item.itunes:summary: Chamonix France Ski & Snowboard resort review / Chamonix known as the Worlds mountain sports capital is famous for its extreme terrain, amazing scenery and picturesque village. For more resort videos and reviews subscribe to this podcast or go to powdertravel.com
